name: Aggressive Infiltration
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to each exhausted opposing hero and ally.

name: All Aboard for Undercity!
rules: Each player puts a [Horde] ally from his graveyard into his hand.

name: Arcane Burst
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Arcane Tactics
rules: Ongoing: When you draw a card, your hero may deal 1 arcane damage to target ally.

name: Army of the Dead
rules: Destroy all allies. For each ally destroyed this way, you put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Astral Denial
rules: Interrupt target quest reward effect. ;Ongoing: When an opponent completes a quest, destroy this ability. If you do, interrupt that quest's reward effect.

name: Belligerence
rules: Ongoing: You pay 2 less to strike with Melee weapons on your turn.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere.): Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed Melee weapon into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Berserk
rules: Feral Hero Required;Ongoing: While your hero has Bear Form, when it's dealt combat damage, you may draw a card.;While your hero has Cat Form, when it deals combat damage to a hero, its controller discards a card.
flavour: I'm pretty sure we should run now... - Grumpherys

name: Blessing of Cenarius
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1. ; When attached ally is destroyed, you may draw a card.

name: Blessing of Liberty
rules: Attach to target friendly non-hero card.;Ongoing: Attached card has Untargetable.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Target friendly non-hero card has Untargetable this turn.

name: Bloody Grip
rules: Attach to target weapon.;Ongoing: As this ability enters play, choose one: This ability has Attached weapon has +3 ATK; or this ability has You pay 3 less to strike with attached weapon.

name: Bombard
rules: Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment that entered play this turn.

name: Boon of Light
rules: Your hero heals 12 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.

name: Call of the Grove
rules: Ongoing: Each turn, you can place an additional resource if you've placed a quest that turn.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Chimera Shot
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required; You may choose a different one for each different name among Stings you control: Destroy target ally; destroy target equipment; or destroy target resource.

name: Conflagration Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.);Attach to target attacker.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each other hero and ally in attached character's party.

name: Corpse Explosion
rules: Unholy Hero Required;Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, your hero deals 4 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Crippling Strike
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target ally has -3 ATK while in combat with your hero this turn.

name: Dark Penance
rules: Target opponent discards a random card and destroys a random ally he controls.

name: Dead Weight
rules: Attach to target ally or equipment.;Ongoing: When attached card exhausts, destroy it.

name: Deadly Throw
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.);Your Daggers have Thrown and +X ATK this turn.

name: Death and Decay
rules: Ongoing: When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally this turn, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.

name: Death Pact
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally you control.;Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's [Health] and has +X ATK this turn, where X was that ally's ATK.

name: Death Wish
rules: Fury Hero Required;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> All heroes have +3 ATK this turn.

name: Debilitating Shout
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies and weapons have -2 ATK.

name: Delusions of Grandeur
rules: Target opponent puts an ability, ally, and equipment he controls into their owner's hands.

name: Detonate Soul
rules: Attach to target opposing ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove attached ally and all other opposing allies from the game.

name: Devouring Plague
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to attached hero. Attached hero's controller discards a card for each damage dealt this way.

name: Disarm Trap
rules: Interrupt target instant.

name: Dispersion
rules: Shadow Hero Required;Ongoing: This ability enters play with two incorporeal counters.;Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero.;At the start of your turn, remove an incorporeal counter. If none remain, destroy this ability.

name: Divine Storm
rules: Retribution Hero Required;Your hero deals X unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally that dealt damage this turn, where X is the ATK of a weapon you control.

name: Enveloping Shadows
rules: Subtlety Hero Required;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target ally can't deal damage this turn.

name: Feline Grace
rules: Ongoing: 2, [Exhaust] -> Ready your hero.;Your hero has Cat Form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Feral Spirit
rules: Enhancement Hero Required;Put two 4 [Melee] / 4 [Health] Spirit Wolf ally tokens into play with Protector.

name: Freeze
rules: Attach to target opposing ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card can't attack or exhaust.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere.): Target opposing ally or weapon can't attack or exhaust this turn.

name: Frost Burst
rules: Target hero or ally has -4 ATK while attacking or protecting this turn.

name: Galvanize
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Choose one: Ally tokens you control have +1 ATK this turn; or target ally token you control has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Gathering of Wits
rules: Gain control of any number of target opposing allies with combined cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Gushing Wound
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 melee damage to attached hero. Attached hero's controller may draw a card.

name: Hammer of the Divine
rules: Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Each of them can't ready during its controllers next ready step.

name: Haunt
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a spirit counter, and your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached hero.;Remove all spirit counters, destroy this ability -> Your hero heals damage from itself equal to the number of counters removed this way.

name: Human Shield
rules: If damage would be dealt to an ally you control this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

name: Hurricane
rules: Ongoing: This ability enters play with two wind counters.;Opposing heroes and allies can't attack or protect. ; At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally, then remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy Hurricane.

name: Icy Torment
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.;When damage is dealt this way, target ally in attached hero's party has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Incendiary Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, this ability deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Living Bomb
rules: Fire Hero Required; Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a fuse counter. Then, if there are ten or more, your hero deals 50 fire damage to attached hero, and destroy this ability.

name: Mana Sapphire
rules: Ongoing: X, Destroy this ability -> If X is 5 or less, draw X cards.

name: Mass Purge
rules: Destroy any number of abilities that aren't attached to friendly cards.

name: Master's Call
rules: If you control a Pet, destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero.;While you control a Pet this turn, your hero has Untargetable, and Pets you control can protect your hero.

name: Mirror Image
rules: Put three 0 [Arcane] / 1 [Health] Mirror ally tokens into play with If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to a random hero or Mirror you control instead.

name: Natural Repossession
rules: Choose one or both: Destroy target ability; or destroy target equipment.

name: Nature's Focus
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target ally, or your hero heals 4 damage from target hero.

name: Next Stop, Menethil Harbor!
rules: Each player puts an [Alliance] ally he controls into its owner's hand.

name: Nourish
rules: Ongoing: If damage would be healed from your hero, that much +5 is healed instead.;When damage is healed from an ally you control, you may draw a card.

name: Obliterate
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if you control a Disease.

name: Offering to the Nether
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove this ability from the game. If you do, you may remove target ability, ally, or equipment from the game.

name: Perforation Poison
rules: Attach to target hero that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals nature damage to attached hero equal to 1 plus the number of weapons you control.

name: Plunder
rules: Attach to target location or quest.;Ongoing: You control attached resource.

name: Polymorph Penguin
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is also a Penguin.

name: Power Word: Sanctuary
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attached ally.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere.): Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target ally you control this turn.

name: Power Word: Vigor
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 [Health].
flavour: Maybe this will help keep you from dying so easily. - Xerandaal, Shade Servitor

name: Prayer of Shadow Protection
rules: Friendly heroes and allies have Shadow Resistance this turn. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that they would be dealt.)

name: Provoke
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it. This turn, a hero dealt damage this way must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.

name: Putrefying Poison
rules: Attach to target hero that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached hero.;When damage is dealt this way, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target ally in attached hero's party.

name: Raptor Strike
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target ally that entered play this turn.

name: Recklessness
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add an abandon counter.;If your hero would deal or be dealt damage, that much +X is dealt instead, where X is the number of abandon counter.

name: Reconstruct
rules: Put target equipment from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Ruination
rules: Choose one or both: Destroy target ally; or destroy target weapon.

name: Scorpid Sting
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, he exhausts an equipment he controls. If you control a Ranged weapon, he exhausts a second equipment he controls.

name: Seal of Divinity
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, prevent all damage that would be dealt to target friendly ally this turn.

name: Shadow Burst
rules: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.

name: Shadow Resistance Aura
rules: Ongoing: Friendly allies have Shadow Resistance while ready. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that they would be dealt.)

name: Shadow Ward
rules: Your hero has Shadow Resistance this turn. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that they would be dealt.);When damage that an opposing hero or ally would deal is prevented this way, your hero may deal that much shadow damage to target hero or ally.

name: Shadow Word: Chaos
rules: Your hero deals 4 shadow damage to a random opposing hero or ally.

name: Shadows of Death
rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy a Demon or Ghoul you control -> Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.

name: Shield Block
rules: You may exhaust a Shield you control rather than pay this card's cost.;Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

name: Shield of Distortion
rules: Prevent all non-melee (non-[Melee]) damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

name: Sinister Set-up
rules: Exhaust up to two target heroes and/or allies. Each of them can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Smoldering Blast
rules: Ongoing: Destroy this ability -> Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target ally.

name: Soothing Wave
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage from each of up to two target heroes and/or allies.

name: Spoils of the Hunt
rules: Destroy all opposing allies that have or share the highest cost among opposing allies.

name: Squall Totem
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.;When an opposing hero or ally attacks or protects, you may exhaust a second target hero or ally.

name: Staunch Reprisal
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector. When your hero protects, it may deal 2 melee damage to target attacker.

name: Stifling Decree
rules: Attach to target ability or weapon.;Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt with attached card.

name: Suffocating Grip
rules: Interrupt target ally with cost X played by an opponent. If you do, your hero deals X shadow damage to his hero.

name: Surge of Lightning
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 6 nature damage to target ally; or your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to up to three target allies, respectively.

name: Terrifying Visage
rules: Put each of up to two target opposing allies into its owner's hand.

name: Tidal Infusion
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon you control.;Ongoing: When attached card exhausts, you may draw a card.

name: Tuskarr Kite
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] , Exhaust an ally you control -> Put the card tenth from the top of your deck in your hand.
flavour: A popular pastime in Tuskarr culture is the creation of intricate and decorative kites.

rules: Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play and strike with weapons.

rules: As an additional cost to play, remove an ally in your graveyard from the game.;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

rules: Ongoing: 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready your hero. Your hero has Bear Form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally dealt damage this turn.

rules: Shadow Resistance;When this ally enters play, you may put target Death Knight or Undead ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Winston Duskhaven
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.);2, Discard a card -> Target hero or ally has Shadow Resistance this turn.

name: Zealot Kalinov
rules: While this ally is in your graveyard, your hero has Mend 1.

name: Arm Blade of Augelmir
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.

name: Blade of the Empty Void
rules: While this weapon is in your graveyard, your hero has Protector.

name: Bloodbane's Fall
rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Boots of the Whirling Mist
rules: [Druid] Hero: [Exhaust] -> Remove your hero from combat. ;[Rogue] Hero: [Exhaust] -> Interrupt target ability that's targeting your hero.

name: Breastplate of Undeath
rules: This armor enters play with five +1 [DEF] counters.; At the start of your turn, remove a +1 [DEF] counter. If none remain, destroy this armor.

name: Crimson Cranium Crusher
rules: When an opposing resource turns face down, you may draw a card.

name: Dagger of Betrayal
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Target opponent chooses an ally he controls. Exchange control of that ally and this weapon.

name: Dragonflight Great-Ring
rules: At the start of your turn, destroy target hero.

name: Edge of Oblivion
rules: This weapon enters play with five +1 ATK counters.;At the start of your turn, remove a +1 ATK counter. If none remain, destroy this weapon.

name: Encrusted Zombie Finger
rules: When your hero attacks, you may point and make a Zombie noise. If you do, this weapon has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Extract of Necromantic Power
rules: As each turn starts,;[Warlock] Hero: Prevent the next 3 melee ([Melee]) damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.;[Death Knight] Hero: Prevent the next 3 non-melee damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

name: Fleshwerk Throwing Glaive
rules: Thrown;[Rogue] Hero: This weapon has +1 ATK. ; [Warrior] Hero: You pay 1 less to strike with this weapon.

name: Gavel of the Fleshcrafter
rules: Your hero has Mend 3. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 3 damage from target hero or ally.)

name: Greaves of Ancient Evil
rules: When damage is prevented with this armor,; [Death Knight] Hero: Ready a weapon you control. ; [Paladin] Hero: Ready another armor you control.;[Warrior] Hero: Ready your hero.

name: Incursion Vestments
rules: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn: ;[Mage] Hero: 1, [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.;[Priest] Hero: 1, [Exhaust] -> Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.;[Warlock] Hero: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target opponent discards a card.

name: King Dred's Helm
rules: When your hero turns face down, target up to three heroes and/or allies.;[Hunter] Hero: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of them.;[Shaman] Hero: Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Life-Staff of the Web Lair
rules: Nerubian Reputation;Nerubian allies you control have +1 / +1.;[Exhaust] -> Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Nerubian allies you control.

name: Mighty Shadow Protection Potion
rules: Destroy this item -> Target friendly hero or ally has Shadow Resistance this turn. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that it would be dealt.)

name: Netherbreath Spellblade
rules: If you would draw a card, you may skip drawing it instead.;When you first skip drawing a card this way on each of your turns, put target ability from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Oracle Talisman of Ablution
rules: Allies you control that share a class with your hero have Assault 1.

name: Reanimator's Hacker
rules: 2, Destroy this weapon -> Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Reaper of Dark Souls
rules: This weapon enters play with X +1 ATK counters.

name: Riot Shield
rules: When your hero is dealt combat damage, you may add a +1 [DEF] counter.

name: Saliva Corroded Pike
rules: When damage is dealt with this weapon on an opponent's turn, you may ready it.

name: Shoulderpads of Fleshwerks
rules: When this armor enters play, you may destroy target ally with Mend or Protector.

name: Spaulders of Lost Secrets
rules: When this armor enters play, you may put the bottom card of your deck into your hand.

name: Staff of Sinister Claws
rules: At the start of your turn, target random ally you control has Assault 2 this turn.

name: The Darkspeaker's Footpads
rules: [Exhaust] -> Ready a resource you control.

name: Touch of Unlife
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If damage is dealt this way, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Trapper's Rifle
rules: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.;At the end of your turn, you may ready your hero.

name: Trophy Gatherer
rules: You pay 3 less to strike with this weapon while your hero is in combat with an ally with cost 4 or more.;When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

name: Unearthed Broadsword
rules: At the start of your turn, if this weapon is in your graveyard, you may pay 1. If you do, put it into your hand.

name: Vengeance Wrap
rules: When this armor enters play, you may remove an ally in a graveyard from the game.;[Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally that shares a class or race with that ally.

name: Auryna the Lightsworn
rules: If you control another Paladin: Flip Auryna -> Auryna deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally that dealt damage this turn.

name: Blythe the Pyromaniac
rules: If you control another Mage: Flip Blythe -> Blythe deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Bordrak Barrelblast
rules: If you control another Hunter: Flip Bordrak -> Put a +1 ATK counter on target Ranged weapon

name: Emerson Zantides
rules: If you control another Priest: Flip Emerson -> Emerson deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and 2 shadow damage to himself.

name: Erondra Frostmoon
rules: If you control another Death Knight: Flip Erondra -> Target ally has -2 [Health] this turn.

name: Felbender Lara
rules: If you control another Warlock: Flip Lara -> Lara deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally with an attachment.

name: Ivan, Bladewind Brute
rules: If you control another Warrior: Flip Ivan -> Ivan deals 2 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.

name: Kaerie, Defender of the Sunwell
rules: If you control another Paladin: Flip Kaerie -> Kaerie deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target ally that dealt damage this turn.

name: Levander of the Sanguine Shot
rules: If you control another Hunter: Flip Levander -> Ready target Ranged weapon.

name: Maloduri
rules: If you control another Warrior: Flip Maloduri -> Target hero or ally has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Nylaith, Guardian of the Wild
rules: If you control another Druid: Flip Nylaith -> Nylaith has Protector this turn.

name: Prometha
rules: If you control another Shaman: Flip -->Prometha Ready target Melee Weapon.

name: Riley Sizzleswitch
rules: If you control another Mage: Flip Riley -> Riey deals 2 fire damage to target ally.

name: Rordag the Sly
rules: If you control another Rogue: Flip Rordag -> Target hero or ally can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Souldrinker Bogmara
rules: If you control another Warlock: Flip Bogmara -> Bogmara deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from herself.

name: Teina Cloudstalker
rules: If you control another Druid: Flip Teina -> Teina has +1 ATK while attacking this turn

name: Triton the Sacrilegious
rules: If you control another Death Knight: Flip Triton -> This turn, opposing heroes and allies must attack if able and can attack only Triton if able.

name: Xerandaal, Shade Servitor
rules: If you control another Priest: Flip Xerandaal -> Xerandaal deals 3 shadow damage to target hero.

name: Zagrun Wolfeye
rules: If you control another Shaman: Flip Zagrun -> Put a +1 ATK counter on target Melee weapon.

name: Zorak'tul
rules: If you control another Rogue: Flip Zorak'tul -> Exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Legendary Leathers, Dalaran
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less to play your next Leather or Mail armor this turn for each Leatherworking hero and ally you control.

name: Talismanic Textiles, Dalaran
rules: [Exhaust] -> Put X + 1 [DEF] counters on target Cloth armor you control, where X is the number of Tailoring heroes and allies you control.

name: Tanks for Everything, Dalaran
rules: [Exhaust] -> Ready up to X target Plate armor you control, where X is the number of Blacksmithing heroes and allies you control.

name: Kel'Thuzad
rules: [Hunter], [Mage], [Rogue], [Warlock], or [Warrior] Hero Required;When your hero becomes Kel'Thuzad, target an opponent. Gain control of an ally he controls. Search his zones for one ally each and put any number of them into play.

name: A Voice in the Dark
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: An opponent chooses one: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand; or draw a card.

name: Brothers in Death
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Culling the Damned
rules: Reveal any number of cards from your hand and pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you revealed an ability, draw a card.;If you revealed an ally, draw a card.;If you revealed an equipment, draw a card.

name: Dark Horizon
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. If a hero or ally you controlled dealt shadow ([Shadow]) damage this turn, draw another card.

name: Death to the Traitor King
rules: Nerubian Reputation;On your turn: Declare an opposing hero or ally the Traitor King this turn and pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 while attacking the Traitor King this turn.

name: Death's Gaze
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have fewer cards in your hand than in your graveyard, draw a card.

name: Defiling the Defilers
rules: If allies you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
rules: On your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target Demon ally from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Junkboxes Needed
rules: On your turn: Choose ability, ally, or equipment, and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card of that kind. He discards that card.

name: Pure Evil
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: If an ability is in your graveyard, draw a card. If an ally is in your graveyard, draw a card. If an equipment is in your graveyard, draw a card.

name: Sacrifices Must Be Made
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards, then discard two cards unless you discard an ally.

name: Scourge Tactics
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each ally in your graveyard.;Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Tales of Destruction
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment, remove a card of that kind in your graveyard from the game, and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of that kind into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Overseer's Shadow
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you control an ability, draw a card.;If you control an ally, draw a card.;If you control an equipment, draw a card.

name: The Restless Dead
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Each player shuffles his graveyard into his deck, and then draw a card.

name: Under the Shadow
rules: Pay 1 and name a damage type to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with ATK of that type into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Unfit for Death
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card and remove target card in a graveyard from the game.

name: Whirlwind Weapon
rules: On your turn: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Your hero deals X melee damage to each opposing ally, where X is the ATK of a Melee weapon you control.

name: World of Shadows
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, and target hero or ally you control has Shadow Resistance this turn. (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that it would be dealt.)

name: Devouring Plague
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to attached hero. Attached hero's controller discards a card for each damage dealt this way.

name: Kilix the Unraveler
rules: Nerubian Reputation, Protector

name: Spectral Kitten
rules: [Horde] allies you control have +1 ATK. [Alliance] allies you control have +1 [Health]. Non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] allies you control have +1 / +1.
flavour: To see it with my own eyes... Marvelous! - Ruby Gemsparkle

name: Tiny
rules: When you place a resource face up, you pay 2 less to complete your next quest this turn.;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Tuskarr Kite
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] , Exhaust an ally you control -> Put the card tenth from the top of your deck in your hand.
flavour: A popular pastime in Tuskarr culture is the creation of intricate and decorative kites.

name: Deathcharger
rules: You pay 1 less to complete quests.;When you place a resource face up, target opposing hero or ally has -3 [Health] this turn.;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Army of the Dead
rules: Destroy all allies. For each ally destroyed this way, you put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Edge of Oblivion
rules: This weapon enters play with five +1 ATK counters.;At the start of your turn, remove a +1 ATK counter. If none remain, destroy this weapon.

name: Flint Shadowmore
rules: If this ally would deal combat damage, he may deal that much divided as you choose among any number of opposing heroes and/or allies instead.

name: Great Elekk
rules: Draenei Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests.;When you place a resource face up, this turn, if your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +2 instead. ; (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Swift Ram
rules: Dwarf Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. ; When you place a resource face up, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. ;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Wind Shear
rules: Choose one or both: Interrupt target ability, or exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Kel'Thuzad
rules: [Hunter], [Mage], [Rogue], [Warlock], or [Warrior] Hero Required;When your hero becomes Kel'Thuzad, target an opponent. Gain control of an ally he controls. Search his zones for one ally each and put any number of them into play.

name: Whitney Gravecaller
rules: Shadow Resistance;When this ally enters play, you may put target Death Knight or Undead ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Incendiary Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, this ability deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Shield of Distortion
rules: Prevent all non-melee (non-[Melee]) damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

name: Death and Decay
rules: Ongoing: When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): When your hero enters combat with a hero or ally this turn, it deals 1 shadow damage to that character.

name: Garrosh Hellscream
rules: Protector;Each ally you control has Assault X, where X is its printed ATK.
flavour: The Lich King sought to sow the seeds of fear. Let me be the first to show him the Horde fears nothing!

name: Lord Darion Mograine
rules: 1, Destroy a Death Knight you control -> Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Blade of the Empty Void
rules: While this weapon is in your graveyard, your hero has Protector.

name: Edge of Oblivion
rules: This weapon enters play with five +1 ATK counters.;At the start of your turn, remove a +1 ATK counter. If none remain, destroy this weapon.

name: Encrusted Zombie Finger
rules: When your hero attacks, you may point and make a Zombie noise. If you do, this weapon has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Life-Staff of the Web Lair
rules: Nerubian Reputation;Nerubian allies you control have +1 / +1.;[Exhaust] -> Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Nerubian allies you control.

name: Obliterate
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if you control a Disease.

name: Buzz
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target equipment.;Death Rattle (When this ally enters your graveyard from anywhere):; You may destroy target weapon.

name: Sinister Set-up
rules: Exhaust up to two target heroes and/or allies. Each of them can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Jek'kresh
rules: Protector, Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.);Death Rattle (When this ally enters your graveyard from anywhere): Target ally you control has Shadow Resistance this turn.

name: King Varian Wrynn
rules: Protector;Opposing heroes and allies have -1/-1 for each different card type you control.
flavour: The time has come to bring retribution for the countless souls lost in Lordaron's fall!

name: Great Kodo
rules: Tauren Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. ; When you place a resource face up, you may exhaust target card in play. ;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Mor'zul Bloodbringer
rules: 1, Remove a Warlock ally you control from the game -> Remove target ally from the game.

name: Call of the Grove
rules: Ongoing: Each turn, you can place an additional resource if you've placed a quest that turn.;Death Rattle (When this ability enters your graveyard from anywhere): Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Mirror Image
rules: Put three 0 [Arcane] / 1 [Health] Mirror ally tokens into play with If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to a random hero or Mirror you control instead.

name: Polymorph Penguin
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is also a Penguin.

name: Hammer of the Divine
rules: Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Each of them can't ready during its controllers next ready step.
